question: Hello Everyone!!!  I am in desperate need for reservoirs for the paradigm 712.  I am using my very last one at the moment.  No need to say times are tough, im sure they are for everyone.  I am a single young mother trying to stretch every penny I make.  I am absolutly willing to pay but figure I may be able to get a better deal from others suffering with diabetes knowing what we go threw on a daily basis.  Okay thank you to all!Kimbaly.***@****
title: Desperatly seeking 3.0 paradigm reservoirs
